summary: This bill, the "Relieving Economic Strain to Enhance American Resilience and Competitiveness in Higher Education and Research Act" (RESEARCHER Act), mandates the Director of the Office of Science and Technology Policy (OSTP) to create policy guidelines for federal research agencies to address financial instability among graduate and postdoctoral researchers. It directs agencies to implement these guidelines, including increasing stipends, improving access to benefits, and reducing financial burdens. The bill also requires data collection from the National Science Foundation, a National Academies assessment, and a Government Accountability Office (GAO) study to monitor progress and suggest improvements.
